data

Class SongContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.SongContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CD, SongFile

    public abstract class SongContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that defines the basic structure of a song container (CD, File)
